abstract.para: The National Ecological Observatory Network is a project sponsored by the National Science Foundation.

NEON's mission is to design, implement, and operate continental-scale research infrastructure to open new horizons in ecological science and education, and to enable ecological analyses and forecasts for the benefit of society.
